verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: recently] [V: held] [ARG1: an Oval Office meeting with top communications aides] [ARGM-PNC: to voice his frustration over the many “ leaks ” coming out of the White House , calling for the culprits to be identified and changes made to the communications shop] , [ARGM-ADV: according to two sources with direct knowledge of the meeting] .

[ARG0: President Trump] recently held an Oval Office meeting with top communications aides to [V: voice] [ARG1: his frustration over the many “ leaks ” coming out of the White House] , calling for the culprits to be identified and changes made to the communications shop , according to two sources with direct knowledge of the meeting .

President Trump recently held an Oval Office meeting with top communications aides to voice his frustration over [ARG1: the many “ leaks ”] [V: coming] [ARGM-DIR: out of the White House] , calling for the culprits to be identified and changes made to the communications shop , according to two sources with direct knowledge of the meeting .

[ARG0: President Trump] recently held an Oval Office meeting with top communications aides to voice his frustration over the many “ leaks ” coming out of the White House , [V: calling] [ARG1: for the culprits to be identified and changes made to the communications shop] , according to two sources with direct knowledge of the meeting .

President Trump recently held an Oval Office meeting with top communications aides to voice his frustration over the many “ leaks ” coming out of the White House , calling for the culprits to [V: be] identified and changes made to the communications shop , according to two sources with direct knowledge of the meeting .
